description.brazilian: Terminou o jogo sem uma tocha ativa

description.english: Beat the game with all corpses
description.german: Das Spiel mit allen Leichnamen beendet
description.schinese: 使用所有尸体通关游戏

description.brazilian: Sobreviveu 10 minutos nos Salões da Infinidade
description.english: Survive 10 minutes in the halls of infinity
description.german: 10 Minuten in den Hallen der Unendlichkeit überlebt
description.schinese: 在无限大厅中生存10分钟

description.brazilian: Sobreviveu 30 minutos nos Salões da Infinidade
description.english: Survive 30 minutes in the halls of infinity
description.german: 30 Minuten in den Hallen der Unendlichkeit überlebt
description.schinese: 在无限大厅中生存30分钟

description.brazilian: Sobreviveu 40 minutos nos Salões da Infinidade
description.english: Survive 40 minutes in the halls of infinity
description.german: 40 Minuten in den Hallen der Unendlichkeit überlebt
description.schinese: 在无限大厅中生存40分钟

description.brazilian: Viajou 2500 de distância do ponto de spawn
description.russian: Прошел 2500 единиц расстояния от точки старта

description.brazilian: Não matou inimigos por 10 minutos nos Salões da Infinidade
description.english: Kill no enemies for 10 minutes in the halls of infinity
description.german: 10 Minuten lang keine Gegner in den Hallen der Unendlichkeit getötet
description.russian: Не убивал врагов в течение 10 минут в залах бесконечности
description.schinese: 在无限大厅中10分钟内不杀死任何敌人

description.brazilian: Rerrolou a seleção de habilidades 10 vezes em uma única partida
description.english: Re roll skill selection 10 times in one run.
description.german: 10 Mal die Fähigkeitsauswahl in einem Durchgang neu gewürfelt
description.russian: Перевыбрал навыки 10 раз за один забег
description.schinese: 在一次游戏中重新选择技能10次

description.brazilian: Ficou parado por 5 minutos nos Salões da Infinidade
description.english: Stand still for 5 minutes in the halls of infinity
description.german: 5 Minuten lang still in den Hallen der Unendlichkeit gestanden
description.russian: Стоял на месте 5 минут в залах бесконечности
description.schinese: 在无限大厅中静止站立5分钟

description.brazilian: Ficou parado por 10 minutos nos Salões da Infinidade
description.english: Stand still for 10 minutes in the halls of infinity
description.german: 10 Minuten lang still in den Hallen der Unendlichkeit gestanden
description.russian: Стоял на месте 10 минут в залах бесконечности
description.schinese: 在无限大厅中静止站立10分钟

description.brazilian: Destruiu 1000 objetos nos Salões da Infinidade
description.english: Destroy 1000 objects in the halls of infinity
description.german: 1000 Objekte in den Hallen der Unendlichkeit zerstört
description.schinese: 在无限大厅中摧毁1000个物体

description.brazilian: Teve 10 inimigos perigosos vivos ao mesmo tempo nos Salões da Infinidade
description.english: Have 5 dangerous foes alive at once in halls of infinity
description.german: 10 gefährliche Gegner gleichzeitig in den Hallen der Unendlichkeit am Leben
description.russian: Одновременно живы 10 опасных врагов в залах бесконечности
description.schinese: 在无限大厅中同时有10个危险敌人存活

description.brazilian: Teve 20 inimigos perigosos vivos ao mesmo tempo nos Salões da Infinidade
description.english: Have 10 dangerous foes alive at once in halls of infinity
description.german: 20 gefährliche Gegner gleichzeitig in den Hallen der Unendlichkeit am Leben
description.russian: Одновременно живы 20 опасных врагов в залах бесконечности
description.schinese: 在无限大厅中同时有20个危险敌人存活

description.english: Try to inflict bleed on skeletons.
description.german: Versucht, Skelette zum Bluten zu bringen

description.brazilian: Alcançou 100% de anima pela primeira vez
Teve 10 raios de Encladeus na tela ao mesmo tempo
description.english: Have 10 encladeus beams on the screen at one time.
description.schinese: 同时有10个恩克拉德斯光束在屏幕上

description.russian: Пройдена игра с трупом без улучшений
description.schinese: 使用未升级的尸体通关游戏

description.brazilian: Terminou o jogo com 1 de vida restante
description.english: Beat the game with 1 life remaining
description.german: Das Spiel mit einem verbleibenden Leben beendet

description.brazilian: Derrotou 5 inimigos perigosos nos Salões da Infinidade
description.english: Defeat 5 dangerous foes in the halls of infinity
description.german: 5 gefährliche Gegner in den Hallen der Unendlichkeit besiegt
description.russian: Побеждено 5 опасных врагов в залах бесконечности
description.schinese: 在无限大厅中击败5个危险敌人

description.schinese: 在无限大厅中击败50个危险敌人

description.brazilian: Possui as habilidades Bola de Fogo e Muro de Gelo
description.russian: Имеет навыки огненного шара и ледяной стены

description.brazilian: Elevou uma habilidade de nível 1 ao nível máximo
description.english: Bring a Tier 1 skill to max level.
description.german: Eine Fähigkeit der Stufe 1 auf die maximale Stufe gebracht
description.schinese: 将一个1级技能升到满级

description.brazilian: Elevou uma habilidade de nível 2 ao nível máximo
description.english: Bring a Tier 2 skill to max level.
description.german: Eine Fähigkeit der Stufe 2 auf die maximale Stufe gebracht
description.schinese: 将一个2级技能升到满级

description.brazilian: Derrotou um inimigo perigoso com apenas um tipo de habilidade
description.english: Defeat a dangerous foe while having only 1 skill type
description.german: Einen gefährlichen Gegner besiegt, während nur eine Fähigkeitsart ausgerüstet war
description.russian: Победил опасного врага, имея только один тип навыка
description.schinese: 在只装备一种技能的情况下击败一个危险敌人
拥有4种不同的物理技能
拥有8种不同的元素技能
拥有6种不同的魔法技能

description.brazilian: Possui 3 habilidades de cada tipo (3 mágicas/3 elementais/3 físicas)
description.english: Have 3 of each type of skill (3 magic/3 ele/3 phys)
description.german: 3 Fähigkeiten jedes Typs besitzen (3 magisch/3 elementar/3 physisch)
description.russian: Имеет 3 навыка каждого типа (3 магии/3 элемента/3 физики)
description.schinese: 拥有每种类型的3个技能（3魔法/3元素/3物理）

description.brazilian: Causou mais de 1000 de dano a um inimigo perigoso
description.english: Hit a dangerous foe for over 1000 damage.
description.german: Einem gefährlichen Gegner über 1000 Schaden zugefügt
description.schinese: 对一个危险敌人造成超过1000点伤害

description.brazilian: Usou todos os cadáveres uma vez
Foi atingido pelo ataque do chefe Flamecaster
description.english: Get hit by flamecaster boss attack
description.schinese: 被火焰法师Boss的攻击击中

displayName.german: Die Zeit vergeht für uns alle
displayName.schinese: 时间对我们所有人流逝

description.brazilian: Morreu para o anel da morte
description.english: Die to the ring of death
description.german: Durch den Ring des Todes gestorben

description.brazilian: Possui 3 habilidades de fogo e 3 de gelo
description.english: Have 3 fire skills and 3 ice skills
description.schinese: 拥有3个火焰技能和3个冰霜技能

description.brazilian: Alcançou a velocidade máxima com Indomável
description.schinese: 使用不屈达到最大速度
